channel.title: openwrt on shengli's blog
channel.description: Recent content in openwrt on shengli's blog

item.title: Build service with SOA in Openwrt
item.description: In one of internal technical review meeting, the coder integrate the service into a existed substance/service, but considering of the scalability of this service, I strongly recommended the developer decouple this service from any substance and made them into a self-contained substance in order to provide the service to more clients in the future.
